self_predictions.prediction_summary: Michael believes he has a good chance of winning if he follows his training program and shows up in his best shape. He acknowledges Vitaly's strength but is confident in his stopping power and endurance.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Michael thinks Vitaly might try to flash pin him, but he doubts Vitaly can do it three times in a row.

Vitaly Laletin.previous_match_summary: Vitaly is younger and bigger, and Michael expects to face the strongest version of him.

Ermes Gasparini.strength: Ermes has the strongest riser and up pressure, possibly the strongest ever.
Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Ermes beat Michael 3-0, but Michael believes it was closer than the score suggests.

Levan Saginashvili.strength: Levan might be able to flash pin Michael, but Michael is unsure.
Levan Saginashvili.previous_match_summary: Michael thinks if he can stop the match, he has a chance against Levan due to his endurance and heart.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Michael thinks it's very difficult to bet against Devon, especially in his current big version. He believes Devon's control and endurance will be key.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Devon's pronation and riser strength are highlighted as advantages.

Devon Larratt.strength: Devon is better at the center and has strong pronation and riser.
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon's ability to control the match from the center is emphasized.

Alex Kurdecha.strength: Alex is strong but may struggle against Devon's control.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Michael believes Ermes has a chance against Levan if he can leverage his riser and up pressure to make the match last longer.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Ermes' strength in riser and up pressure could be key.

Levan Saginashvili.strength: Levan is extremely strong but may struggle if the match goes long.

Ermes Gasparini.strength: Ermes has the strongest riser and up pressure.
